website_summaries.verdict: Simple 5-point star design that has an extremely low price. However, its look won't appeal to everyone.
pros: One of the least expensive Christmas tree toppers you can find
Offered in either 6.5" or 8" in height and in 3 color options
Consists of a shatter-resistant plastic that ensures it will last year after year
cons: No option to have it light up on the tree

customer_reviews.title: Poor Craftsmanship and Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The size and shape of this star is nice but the craftsmanship and quality is poor. There are scratch marks all over it. There is white paint splatter all over it. And there is glitter in the center which comes off and makes a mess. The listing doesn't say anything about glitter, which is a nuisance. If they did a better job with quality control and got rid of the glitter, this would have been perfect. Unfortunately, it leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Superbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. It's not lit up (which I knew when ordering), but it sparkles and reflects light beautifully. I had to trim the top of my artificial tree for it to sit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight plastic, should have just bought one locally, not a great deal...also does not light up, so the top of the tree is dark. Will buy something else for next year. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Shining star.
customer_reviews.text: Got this, this week for my 4 foot tree. It looks great, fits perfect perfect size for a 4 ft. Tree. No it does not have a light, but it does reflect the light from the tree somewhat. Great price too, comparing all others I've seen. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana In Florida

customer_reviews.title: Less is MORE, has its own shine
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something simple, uncomplicated and lightweight for my fake tree. I read a review and saw a a picture that mentioned how the Christmas lights reflected off the star made it look like it lit up. And it’s true. My picture doesn’t do much justice but the star has this less is more aspect to it. And lights give the start a golden light reflection. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: jaime vaquiz

customer_reviews.title: I like this Christmas tree topper a lot for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this Christmas tree topper a lot for the price and what it is, except the copper color is much brighter than it looks in the image on Amazon - it's bright like a brand new shiny penny. And that's fine, but I expected it to be different to go with the more "aged" copper color of my Christmas ornaments, so I ended up taking some copper paint to it to dull it down.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Looks good as a tree topper and easy to place on ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good as a tree topper and easy to place on the tree. It's a good design and we're really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: james mau

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and fast ship
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and looks so nice on top of my tree. I wanted something that wasn't huge since my tree is a 7-foot pencil tree. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JaneT

customer_reviews.title: Tree Topper - Silver & White Star
customer_reviews.text: This lovely little star is perfect atop my small 3 ft tree. Made well. Quality. Glad I bought it. It will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect topper for our medium sized gold and silver themed tree.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. White

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. This star will not stay on our tree. It doesn't fit over our very standard sized tree branch and is just a breath away from toppling off. It is lightweight, but perhaps a little too feather-light.
customer_reviews.author: Salamander_girl

customer_reviews.title: Great value and oh so cute on a Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: This was adorable and perched exactly as we expected on our downsized Christmas tree. Came in even cuter than I expected love it. Saw. nothing near this cute at the stores
customer_reviews.author: JanT

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and Bright.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. It looks amazing atop of my 6 foot Christmas tree this year.
customer_reviews.author: Rosiemarie Tor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful star! Been searching for years for a star ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful star! Been searching for years for a star for my small tree that didn't cost a fortune and this is perfect! Sturdy, pretty, and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Christmas star for tree
customer_reviews.text: My kid wanted us to have a Christmas star on tree perfect
customer_reviews.author: monica g holmes

customer_reviews.title: Survived a shipping mess
customer_reviews.text: The star is perfect for our first and somewhat quirky tree. It got caught up in shipping and got here a day late but that was probably our sketchy USPS driver that jammed it and 2 other packages inside the mailbox. They bent them all up. Good news is the star survived and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this topper for a 3-foot tree and it was a perfect size. Sturdy material and the sparkly design makes a perfect decoration.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bosse

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little star
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice star for the top of a medium size tree. A little sparkle. Not too over the top. Great price! We love it
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree topper for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tree topper for a great price! I have this on a tree with clay ornaments I got from a trip to Cancun and it compliments them nicely!
customer_reviews.author: AbbyLeone

customer_reviews.title: Buy if your tree is small
customer_reviews.text: If your tree is 3 feet or under this will work well. Anything taller this will seem insignificant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Devotee

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Ok but this shouldn’t be more than $4 for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Phosphor1979

customer_reviews.title: Tree top star for smaller tree.
customer_reviews.text: The star is very pretty, however much smaller than anticipated. Will use for other decoration other than tree top.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine D. Croucher

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small tree this year and it is just the right size. It stays on well and straight and it arrived as promised. I am very satisfied !!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Mccune

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful: -)
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for me as I put it on a small 3' tree. Looks beautiful :-)
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper plastic but looks fine
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty but definitely plastic. The glitter does fall off a bit.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Defective Cheap Plastic Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic. Looks like a dollar store product. Coating on mine was chipped off/scratched in five places. Returned. You will not be happy with this product as it looks really cheaply designed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Size and fit on the tree
customer_reviews.text: The star was a perfect size for out tree, however we did have trouble adjusting it to fit the top of the tree. The price was perfect and it was very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Pooler

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful on my flocked Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: A gorgeous star! Looks beautiful on my flocked Christmas tree!! Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: 😀😀😀
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product and the delivery was very quickly. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Camila Bora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Made of plastic but looks great on top of the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Dallas Cowboys theme for my Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.author: Mazique D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small tree!
customer_reviews.text: The lights from the tree reflect off the tree topper, very pretty
customer_reviews.author: sebastian amenta

customer_reviews.title: Great Top.
customer_reviews.text: We have a thin tree but 7' high, we love this star since it fits perfectly and we have had several compliments. Your name has been passed on. Thank you, family business is a great thing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kelso

customer_reviews.title: ... was smaller than I'd imagined - it still looks wonderful on top of a 10ft (narrow) tree - Lightweight ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this topper was smaller than I'd imagined - it still looks wonderful on top of a 10ft (narrow) tree - Lightweight and shiny, matching our copper accented room!
customer_reviews.author: Rltrpattym

customer_reviews.title: stars for my tree topper locally and this was perfect. Arrived fast and worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find any simple, not too large, stars for my tree topper locally and this was perfect. Arrived fast and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The product was not what I ordered. I ordered the 8 inch star and received the 6.5 inch star. It makes a big difference when it goes on top of a 9 foot tree. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Tibbitts

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful star! Much nicer and more elegant than I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful star! Much nicer and more elegant than I was expecting! It's on my tree right now and is lovely! You all did a great job! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anna W. Somers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great price and very pretty on my tree. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a simple star, that wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple star, that wasn't too big and didn't light up. This looks very simple and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I really like the looks of the star
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of the star; however, I had to use a twist tie to attach it to my artificial tree.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice decoration. I’ll be using it on our tree next year.
customer_reviews.author: John Unklesbay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received the star and it was broken so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and was just perfect for our new tree.
customer_reviews.author: Martia Ives

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the product looks great, the packaging could be a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Style great, quality horrible
customer_reviews.text: Style is simple and perfect but the quality is horrible. Gold part of the star is defective, I probably would of got a better deal at a 99 cent store because what I received was extremely cheap looking. This was for my mini Xmas tree so size was prefect. Picture is both sides of the star.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, but looks cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This little star is the perfect size for my 4 foot tree, and it is light but I paid way too much at $17.99. Looks very cheap, like it was purchased at the dollar store. It looked much nicer in the picture, there are flaws on the plastic, and scratches on the base, I will be able to glue some glitter on it to cover the flaws. The red star was cheaper at $7.99, it may be worth that.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Impressive - Beautiful on our tree.
customer_reviews.text: The Star had no light - yet it picked up the clear lights from our tree and looked like it was lit. Very pretty for the inexpensive price - will be using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nell

customer_reviews.title: I mean, what do you expect for $5? ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean, what do you expect for $5? Its plastic, its really shiny, and its cheap. I was having a hard time finding a copper colored tree topper locally and this works for the season. But will probably be looking for something more substantial for next year!
customer_reviews.author: peachpebbles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful star
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful star. I love the border of silver glitter, and it doesn't flake off too much on your hands. Adds a nice, shiny touch to the top of the tree. This is my son's first Christmas where he really understands what is going on, and he asked for a star on the tree, so of course I obliged, and this one is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Casey May

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!!
customer_reviews.text: A previous reviewer said that you could/should buy this in a $ store. How right they were!! Not worth more than $1. The only reason I'm keeping this star is because of the color (silver and white) and I like the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Topper That is Not Easy To Place On Tree
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great. But it is so lightweight that putting it on the tree is not easy. You can get it set and not touch it and it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hewgley

customer_reviews.title: but I like it anyway
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting it to be all plastic, but I like it anyway. It is the perfect size for my 4.5 ft. tree. The look is unique, and that's what I like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Star Topped a Pretty Tree
customer_reviews.text: The star looks fine on my tree, it was easy to put up there and the right price. Honestly, I would rather have had an angel, but the angels were too expensive at this moment. The star was sent in good time and packaged well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jo

customer_reviews.title: It looks sturdy and light but it also looks very cheap up ...
customer_reviews.text: Many people rated this as "5-star" but it should not be. It looks sturdy and light but it also looks very cheap up close. Looks less cheap on the tree. If you pay more than $10 for this delivered, you are getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: RacerX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect topping
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful tree topper, and just the right size for our tree. It is fairly light weight, so it doesn't bend the artificial tree too badly. I did have to double up the tree wire, but it doesn't show. I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Boyett

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed for my small pre-lit tree. I didn't give it 5 stars because it was made out of plastic. You get what you pay for. However, it still looked nice on my tree.
customer_reviews.author: bchlubber

customer_reviews.title: Great tree topper
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our medium size tree! It was a bit top heavy initially, but easy to adapt. Love that it seems to glow without additional cords, lights, etc. would easily blend with most decors.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with scratches on it.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great except it arrived scratched, with bits of the silver paint removed. The bag was undamaged, so the scratches must have happened at the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: TofuDood

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my four foot tall tree. I was surprised how cute this little star is. Sits nicely at the top, so glad I purchased this tree topper.
customer_reviews.author: carkittter

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Delivered quickly. Even though my mailman forced it into my mailbox, it held up and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: patricjft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect star for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This star is wonderful. It's sturdy and beautiful. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger LilyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Having a star without lights and appropriate to withstand outdoor weather is hard to find. Glad I located this product.
customer_reviews.author: Saturnsal

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Copper and Silver Star
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was Metal. Didn't read "Plastic" in the description. It's pretty nice looking on the Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Vaeth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Just right for my artificial 6.5 ft tree. It's not lit but reflects the lights on the tree well.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty little star adding just the right touch for a small tree
customer_reviews.text: Just right for our little tree, sturdy and not cheap looking
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tree topper.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, to top my copper, black and silver tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Nice star. Well made and it looks good on top of the tree. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful and so light. Perfect for my 3 foot tree.
customer_reviews.author: Nanna

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It's very lightweight and won't topple the top of your tree. It's pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Boxiebabe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree Topper!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful tree topper. It's the perfect size for a mid-size tree, but it would be good for large trees also.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Engels

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some glitter missing on points. Not as obvious up on tree though.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to fold down the branch at the top so the the star wont be wobbly if you are using an artificial tree
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Roach

customer_reviews.title: Makes tree look great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on a 6 ft tree. Reflects the lights and is light enough not to pull down top of tree.
customer_reviews.author: BMW5

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on top of my tree. Exactly what I was looking for and only $10.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I put on 7 ft tree and looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This star topper works perfectly on my new tree in the living room. The new tree had a softer tip and needed a lighter star. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Just as ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the tree at my mother's church. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: qkidmom

product_meta.title: Clever Creations Gold & White Star Christmas Tree Topper Festive Christmas Decor | Sparkling Gold & White Shatter Resistant Plastic | 8" Tall Perfect for Any Size Christmas Tree
product_meta.description:
Size:6.5"| Color:Gold
Measuring 6.5" x 8" x 1", this tree topper fits in perfectly with all kinds of trees. 

100% Satisfaction Guarantee

 In addition to Amazon's standard Return Policy, as the manufacturer we offer a full refund or replacement guarantee for 1 (one) full year. Thank you for choosing Clever Creations.
feature_bullets: MATCH ANY CHRISTMAS DECOR THEME: From rustic to mixed metals, traditional red to minimalist neutral colors, this sparkling gold and white star is the perfect addition to complement your christmas decor. This star tree topper is sure to give your tree that “wow” factor and bring the Christmas spirit into your home

SHATTER RESISTANT: You get all the glam of beautiful, shiny metal without the heavy weight and hazard. This gold and white Christmas tree topper is actually durable, shatter-resistant plastic that stays securely in place on top of the tree where it belongs - perfectly Grinch-proof

PERFECT SIZE: Measures 6.5” x 6.5” x 1”, this tree topper is a great universal size for all kinds of different trees - real or fake, any shape, any size, any color. Simply place on a sturdy, vertical bow and enjoy it all season long

ADD THAT MAGICAL TOUCH TO YOUR TREE: Add the finishing touch to your home’s Christmas tree with this gold and white tree topper. Create Christmas cheer in your home with beautifully designed decor you’ll want to put up year after year

100% GRINCH PROOF OR YOUR MONEY BACK: We at Clever Creations make only the finest home goods of the highest quality, from seasonal decor to staple home items and more. Both functional and beautiful, this star will be the perfect addition to your home during the holiday season or we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee
